channel.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
channel.description: royal blood doesn't mean anything anymore. Not one person with royal blood should step up because they are better as the class they are instead of being king. King actually nerfs the BD if royal steps up. Noble was the only one who could step up and not lose anything from it.

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
tbf is somebody steps up and has a believable NK claim, you’d often be best off electing them.

Read full topic
item.source: Royal blood has lost its touch

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Guards? Knights? Observers?

Wouldn’t you die just as easily as a regular BD class?

What kind of hypothetical situation are we talking about here?

Read full topic

item.description:
yep. confirm right to your death the next night or two lmao.

item.source: Royal blood has lost its touch

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
IMO it’s actually in a pretty good place overall. You have your cost/benefit of a royal blooded king. Being royal means a 0% chance of being any of the starting cult/unseen/neutrals. But for that security you also lose out on a valuable BD member.

Read full topic
item.source: Royal blood has lost its touch

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: bbiaglla
item.description:
ok true at that point but most classes don’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Royal blood has lost its touch

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Poor dev’s can’t win.

Class sucks because he’s not good for anything but becoming king

Class removed

Royal blood sucks because there’s no royal classes bad enough to not be a downgrade

Read full topic
item.source: Royal blood has lost its touch

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Both correct from you and bbiaglla and sometimes the passive ruin BD’s chances by not letting Reaper or Possessor becoming next Neutral king if the previous one died, but it’s mostly player’s fault and their arrogance to become king rather than them will be their undoing.

That would be another matter discussing about them rather become Evil King or the unoffical The Psychopathic King [Which the latter makes more sense as Reaper and Possessor]

Read full topic
item.source: Royal blood has lost its touch

item.title: Royal blood has lost its touch
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
I can’t say you’re wrong. But, What if. You expended all of your night/day abillities? as the BD you played as with royal blood. say, Drunk (used all happy hours) ? (just an example)
